analysis.description:
PolicyPalNetworkToken.emergencyERC20Drain (/unique_chucks/23/0xa4c8a48414d80b22c50be7b6f3cfae3efa6a8716.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_token.transfer(owner,_amount) (/unique_chucks/23/0xa4c8a48414d80b22c50be7b6f3cfae3efa6a8716.sol)

PPNAirdrop.batchSingleAmount has external calls inside a loop:
	- assert(bool)(token.transfer(recipient,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/23/0xa4c8a48414d80b22c50be7b6f3cfae3efa6a8716.sol#116-121)

PPNAirdrop.batchMultipleAmount has external calls inside a loop:
	- assert(bool)(token.transfer(recipient,amount)) (/unique_chucks/23/0xa4c8a48414d80b22c50be7b6f3cfae3efa6a8716.sol#142-143)
